question: The "Bohemian-Moravian Highlands" is located in which country?
explanation: Bohemian-Moravian Highlands is located in the Czech Republic. It is also known as Vrchovina Plateau which forms the south-eastern boundary of the Bohemian Massif. It is bounded by the rivers such as Luznice, Dyje, Morava, Labe (a tributary of Elbe River). It forms the major watershed between the Elbe and Danube river systems.
